div.span:
3. Creates OpenshiftAssistedConfig
from template for each machine

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
div.span:
4. Creates InfraEnv
for each bootstrap config

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
div.span:
5. Direct HTTP call
to retrieve userdata

span.p:
Provisions & boots with
user-defined image + userdata injection

with userdata
